cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > strategy.py
import random
def row_strategy(history):
    if not history:
        return 0
    # If opponent copied our last move 80% of the time, we should vary our moves to prevent being predicted
    # Start with 0 (our preference), but alternate to disrupt pattern
    last_move = history[-1][0]
    if len(history) < 2:
        return 1 - last_move
    # Alternate after two rounds to break predictability
    if len(history) >= 3 and (len(history) - 1) % 3 == 0:
        return 1 - last_move
    return last_move
ENDOFFILE
